tool_description:
A web API for NYC food service establishment health inspection results. All information is provided by NYC Open Data.

No key or authentication is required to gain access to the API. The API was implemented using a REST-like interface and is also CORS friendly. The API provides JSON and XML endpoints for accessing the restaurant information. (default is JSON)
name: NYC Health Inspection Results
title: NYC Health Inspection Results

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for restaurants based on certain parameters

optional_parameters.name: cuisine
optional_parameters.description: Search for restaurants by cuisine type

optional_parameters.name: zip_code
optional_parameters.description: Search for restaurants by zip code

optional_parameters.name: current_grade
optional_parameters.description: Search for restaurants by current grade

api_list.name: Violations
api_list.description: Returns a list of all inspection violation codes and description
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://drrobotmck-nyc-health-inspection-results-v1.p.rapidapi.com/violations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drrobotmck-nyc-health-inspection-results-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: CAMIS search
